section_title: Repeal of male servant duty, and effect thereof on game licence duty.
Advertisement of applications for unclaimed stock, dividends and other moneys.
section_text: 28 1 Where an application is made for a direction under section fifty-five of the  National Debt Act, 1870 (which, as extended by paragraph 6 of the Third Schedule to the  Finance Act, 1921, relates to unclaimed stock, dividends and principal moneys payable on redemption) either— a for the re-transfer of any stock the nominal value whereof exceeds twenty pounds; or b for the payment of any dividends or other moneys amounting in all to more than twenty pounds; the direction may, if the  Registrar of Government Stock  thinks fit, be witheld until three months after public notice of the application has been given by advertisement in such manner and containing such particulars as he may direct. 2 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 3 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .

section_title: Short title, construction, extent and repeals.
section_text: 34 1 This Act may be cited as the Finance Act, 1937. 2 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  3 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  4 Any reference in this Act to any other enactment shall be construed as a reference to that enactment as amended by any subsequent enactment, including (unless the context otherwise requires) this Act. 5 Such of the provisions of this Act as relate to matters with respect to which the Parliament of Northern Ireland has power to make laws shall not extend to Northern Ireland. 6 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
